SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM') As MONTH, SUM(a.total) total, NVL(SUM(a.cnt), 0) qty FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS order_date , SUM(order_pay) as total, COUNT(*) cnt FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY to_char(order_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b
WHERE b.dt = a.order_date(+) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM')
